entry.title: TrayCD - 1.0
entry.content:
Released 1.0.
Bumping the version to 1.0 since I think TrayCD now accomplishes what I set out for it to do. TrayCD is now available in Spanish thanks to Fabrizio Ferri.
I have also opened a forum which I hope you'll use to discuss TrayCD and my other tools, let me know what's good and what's bad.
I have also gotten some reports that my tools show up on some antivirus scanners, these are all false positives! I will try to report it to the antivirus vendors.
Finally, I would like to let you know that I have put donating details on the site, so if you feel this program is useful, please consider donating money.

entry.title: TrayCD - 0.3
entry.content: Changelog: * Can now manage multiple cdrom drives. * Use middle click on tray to open second drive. * New icons by Onyx Reyes, licensed under CC-BY-SA.

entry.title: This feed
entry.content:
Hi everyone.
This feed will let you know when there's any update to TrayCD.
There's also another feed available here which will let you know if there's an update to any of programs.
You can take a look at all my programs here.
